welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Istanbul, where the East meets the West in a city filled with rich history, breathtaking architecture, and vibrant culture. Take in the beauty of the Bosphorus, explore the ancient wonders of the old city, and savor the delicious cuisine. Enjoy your time in this enchanting city!"

restaurants.name: Fıccın
restaurants.description: Fıccın is a caucasian restaurant located in Beyoğlu.
restaurants.address: Asmalı Mescit Mh. Kallavi Sk. No:13/1 - 7/1, 34430 Beyoğlu

restaurants.name: Corner Irish Pub Istanbul
restaurants.description: Corner Irish Pub Istanbul is a irish pub located in İstanbul.
restaurants.address: Asmalı Mescit Mahallesi Meşrutiyet Caddesi No:11/A (Meşrutiyet Caddesi), 34430 İstanbul

restaurants.name: Ara Kafe
restaurants.description: Ara Kafe is a café located in Beyoğlu.
restaurants.address: Tomtom Mah. Tosbağa Sok. No: 2 Galatasaray, 34433 İstanbul

restaurants.name: Reyhun Iranian Restaurant
restaurants.description: Reyhun Iranian Restaurant is a persian restaurant located in Beyoğlu.
restaurants.address: Tomtom Mah. Yeni Çarşı Cad. No:26 Kat :1 (Yeni Çarşi Caddesi), Beyoğlu

restaurants.name: Zeytuna
restaurants.description: Zeytuna is a mediterranean restaurant located in İstanbul.
restaurants.address: Kuloğlu Mah. Hayriye Cad. No:12, İstanbul

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Sabiha Gokcen Airport serves all international flights and is equipped with modern facilities and amenities.

terminals.name: Domestic Terminal
terminals.description: The domestic terminal at Sabiha Gokcen Airport handles all domestic flights and offers a comfortable and efficient travel experience.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Istanbul Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost and charter flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal of Istanbul Airport, primarily used for international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
